message:
Removed the concatenation of a nested Throwable's message from all Exception classes. It was the cause of the NPE in this issue, and isn't necessary as the Exception and stacktrace contain the nested message anyway (i.e. causedBy).
Issue: 2926982


git-svn-id: http://svn.code.sf.net/p/supercsv/code/trunk@225 01ba9438-b82c-4373-9247-da971c9e6a59

added: MockWriter(final Writer stream, final CsvPreference preference) {
final MockWriter absWriter = new MockWriter(new StringWriter(), CsvPreference.EXCEL_PREFERENCE);
* Tests writing a List with a null element (should throw an Exception).
MockWriter writer = new MockWriter(new StringWriter(), CsvPreference.EXCEL_PREFERENCE);
* Tests writing an Object array with a null element (should throw an Exception).
MockWriter writer = new MockWriter(new StringWriter(), CsvPreference.EXCEL_PREFERENCE);
deleted: TestClass(final Writer stream, final CsvPreference preference) {
final TestClass absWriter = new TestClass(new StringWriter(), CsvPreference.EXCEL_PREFERENCE);
